thread.title: Obamas sing 'Happy Birthday' to Usher
thread.title_full: Obamas sing 'Happy Birthday' to Usher | Washington Examiner

author: Joshua Axelrod
title: Obamas sing 'Happy Birthday' to Usher
text:
R&B artist Usher visited the White House over the weekend and for a change was on the receiving end of a song, as President Obama and first lady Michelle Obama sang "Happy Birthday" to him. He was also presented with a birthday cake bearing a single candle.
So this really happened the other night The President and First Lady sang me Happy Birthday at The White House & I...Posted by Usher on  Saturday, October 17, 2015 Usher was in D.C. with other artists like Queen Latifah and Smokey Robinson for a taping of PBS' "In Performance at the White House," which filmed in the White House's East Room.
Related Story: http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/article/2574118/ Politics seems to be increasingly on the minds of America's entertainers. On Friday, actress Lindsay Lohan used Instagram to announce her intentions of running for president in 2020:
She reiterated the point in another Instagram post on Friday morning, this time using a picture of Kanye West, who also recently said he plans on running for president in the next election cycle:
  GOP senator to block Obama noms over co-op closures Sen. Ben Sasse said he plans to block every Department of Health and Human Services nominee.
By Robert King • 10/19/15 3:53 PM Lohan finished off her presidential posting spree with a Saturday morning split photo of her and Mahatma Ghandi that included a #2020, presumably for emphasis:

By Ariel Cohen • 10/19/15 2:28 PM
